document.masterDocTitle: New genus and new species of spittlebugs (Hemiptera: Cercopidae) from the Philippines

subSubSection.paragraph: Philippines : Luzon Island, Visayas: Samar and Leyte , Mindanao Island.

Walker (1851) based his description on two male specimens “a” and “b” from the “ Philippine Islands ” coming from the collections of Mr Cuming and Mr Wood. Both specimens are currently kept in the NHM. According to Walker’ description and Lallemand’ key (1949), we identified specimens, for which we provide photographs and male terminalia description and drawings.
